peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to identify vintage glass bowls?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Features of antique glass Using a magnifying glass, check for imperfections such as bubbles which are common in antique glass. Antique pieces may also have a circular shape at the base, known as a punt mark or pontil mark, from where the rod was broken off during the glass blowing process.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: What to look for in antique and vintage glassware

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to identify the age of glass?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: One of the most prominent indicators of antique glass is the presence of pontil marks. These are irregular, rough, or indented marks left on the base of the glass where it was detached from the pontil rod during the manufacturing process.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How to tell if a glass is antique: 7 tell-tale signs - Cleaning Matters
